attributes.action: ensure that our troops are equipped with the correct personal protection euipment at all times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: our troops deserve to be supplied and equipped with the best that money can buy.this equipment should be made available to every serviceman and woman,to ensure that they are protected from our enemies.and at no time should our service personnel.ever be required to give up this equipment until they leave the theatre of operations.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure that our troops are equipped with the correct personal protection euipment at all times."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11474.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/militarysafety/
